actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for immediate delivery of small denomination United States savings bonds available to the public at the point of purchase.
short_title: United States Savings Bond Availability Act of 1991

summary.text: United States Savings Bond Availability Act of 1991 - Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to make an adequate supply of United States Savings Bonds in denominations of $100 or less available to an issuing agent for immediate, over-the-counter delivery to the public at the point of purchase.

titles.title: United States Savings Bond Availability Act of 1991
To provide for immediate delivery of small denomination United States savings bonds available to the public at the point of purchase.
